resources.string: Please enter a few words describing the chief complaint (NOT the treatment)

The database is pretty stupid, so you have to search using medical terminology. For example, it won\'t understand \"broken arm\" or \"flu\". Use \"humerus fracture\" or \"leprosy\" or whatever seems to be troubling you today.
To give people a better sense of how much hospitals are ripping them off, I made a searchable database of what Medicare actually paid for different types of medical treatments.
Copyright 2013 E Ou. Data collected from cms.gov
